column7: Typo – You may consider to make this a Global Correction using the target search: " kuddhaḥ"  ——becomes—–  " kruddhaḥ" • the initial space surrounding the target search " kuddhaḥ" is required to avoid ativyāpti, which I am sure will delight Andhrabharati, by my mention. The form: " kuddhaḥ" in every single occurrence can only be this: " kruddhaḥ" – There is no other possible correct combination of these letters.
Typo – Please note that this is a "print change", based upon the fact that the "Genus" being cited here is properly termed: "Cordia".
Typo – You may confirm this "print change" by consulting the file: "radiceslingusan00westgoog_0406.jp2"
